channel.title: OneWorld (PI)
channel.description:
This is just a small release as I thought id give PI's a try, but I dont really like them that much.
The biggest thing that I added into the server was the option to use [code=actionscript]"::sethome"[/code] This command made it so that whereever you are when you use that command it changes your home to that spot. ( it only works when you die, it doesnt change the actual "home teleport".
I did add a few minor tweaks and changes I thought would help. I kept the homeport teleport the same ( Draynor) I added things into the shops as they were mostly blank, The "PVP" shop has a few things that shouldnt be in there, so you can just change the items in there to the items that you want. ( I was to lazy to put in the PKP requirments to buy certain items, Some ID codes were off so theres whacky items in there.
The source I used was this [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509843.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509843.0.html[/url] so your going to want to check that out, the client DL is in there, I will NOT provide a client download link.
http://uppit.com/43se2lhz3jxg/Server.rar
If you do decide to download this, Please use that client provided in the ziobotic section.
Im not good with the "Credits" So il just leave them out, as I know I get a very small percentage of credits for this.
[size=24pt]Heres a picture of the command and what happens when you use it![/size] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/161ewsl.jpg[/img]

item.title: OneWorld (PI)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

This isn’t really enough to constitute your own release.

Also, what if someone did sethome during combat in the wilderness? Or at a training spot? Would make it EXTREMELY easy to macro, or abuse the system and respawn in the same place after dying, and then kill the other person or pick up their own items.

Sorry but this needs a lock.

Read full topic

item.title: OneWorld (PI)
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

imsuperman05:

So… you added something from a tutorial, then decided it should be released?

Tbh, I really dont care what you have to say about it, If you dont like it, dont look twice. Theres plenty of other pages you can view.

Read full topic

item.title: OneWorld (PI)
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

So… you added something from a tutorial, then decided it should be released?

Read full topic

item.title: OneWorld (PI)
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

I never was trying to make it different then other PI’s. All I was doing was seeing if i really did like PI’s ( which I dont) Thats why I just stopped coding it, I fiquared someone might like the ::sethome command so i just gave it away, so quit saying I shouldve added more, I dont care about PI’s.

Read full topic

item.title: OneWorld (PI)
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

I’ll act like a noob:
Awesome 1!#w1"$#!RTZUI :mad: :eek: :rolleyes: :o ;D

Now I’ll be realistic.
More stuff has to be added, and this command doesn’t make your server different from any other PI

Read full topic

item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

Ok really, i only released a small update to the other server because i dont like PI’s that much. So all you haters should quit posting crappy comments on my thread.

item.description:

I’m defiantly scared, what’s has come of PI it has turned from being shit to beyond that! And releasing something like this mate, it’s obviously not ready to be released.

item.title: OneWorld (PI)
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:2, topic:414804”]Like…
::sethome coord x, coord y

?[/quote]

Nope, you only have to use ::sethome and it will make that specific tile into the respawn point for you and only YOU.

Read full topic
